properties.areaDesc: Laguna Madre From 5 nm North Of Port Mansfield To Baffin Bay TX; Laguna Madre From the Port Of Brownsville to the Arroyo Colorado; Laguna Madre From The Arroyo Colorado To 5 NM North Of Port Mansfield TX; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 13 at 2:12PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Webcams confirm that areas of fog remain in place over the Laguna
Madre and the Gulf waters immediately adjacent to the coast.
Marine visibility will be reduced to one nautical mile, with
isolated areas of more dense fog featuring visibility of one half
of a mile or less. Conditions will remain conducive to continued
marine fog the rest of today and into tonight, as moist onshore
flow moves over cool surface waters.

Mariners are urged to navigate with caution in the fog,
especially in nearshore areas and in the vicinity of jetties and
bridges.

NWSheadline: MARINE FOG REMAINS STUBBORN OVER COASTAL AREAS
